tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE parking_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  street_name VARCHAR,
  regulation_type VARCHAR,
  permit_required BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE CityOfficials (
	official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ParkingRegulations (
	regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	regulation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	regulation_description VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ParkingPermits (
	permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	permit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	validity_period INT
)

CREATE TABLE parking_violations (
    violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(100),
    violation_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES parking_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Parking_Regulations (
   regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   regulation_type VARCHAR(50),
   regulation_description TEXT,
   regulation_start_date DATE,
   regulation_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Parking_Permits (
   permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_license_plate VARCHAR(20),
   permit_start_date DATE,
   permit_end_date DATE,
   permit_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Parking_Locations (
   location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   location_name VARCHAR(50),
   location_address VARCHAR(100),
   city VARCHAR(50),
   state VARCHAR(2)
);

CREATE TABLE City_Officials (
   official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   official_name VARCHAR(50),
   official_role VARCHAR(50),
   department VARCHAR(50),
   city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Permit_Applications (
   application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   applicant_name VARCHAR(50),
   applicant_contact VARCHAR(50),
   application_date DATE,
   application_status VARCHAR(20)
);
